name: Interuniverse teleport
description:
In the game "Interuniverse Teleport" defend portals that teleport your soldiers to the battlefield. Use magic to strike enemies with lightning, fire, and mines. Be cautious as enemies come in various types: some explode, others split into smaller foes, and some have high health. Strategically deploy soldiers for victory!

Game Features:
  • Beautiful, simple graphics
  • Engaging and unique gameplay
  • Hordes of diverse enemies
  • Challenge your tactical skills
  • Steam achievements support
